caption.p:
Spatial pattern of JJAS mean: ( a) Surface Air Temperature in (i) MERRA, (ii) 2° Best, (iii) 2° Worst, (iv) 1° Best anomaly, (v) 1° Worst anomaly and ( b) Precipitation for (i) TRMM, (ii) 2° Best, (iii) 2° Worst, (iv) 1° Best anomaly, (v) 1° Worst anomaly, over the monsoon domain. Figure is created using the NCAR/NCL
52 software version 6.3.0, https://www.ncl.ncar.edu and Indian boundary data was downloaded from http://www.naturalearthdata.com/downloads in December 2013.
